joys.name: Fenella Powell

quote.message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quote.name: A.A. Milne

joys.message:
Good Morning 👋
Now that you are all settled into Makers I thought I would pop in and start the ✨ Daily Joy Challenge ✨
Every morning one member of the cohort posts some motivational / inspirational / words of their own or a quote, along with a song of their choice to bring some joy to the cohort for the day 💪💛 then tags the next day's joy bringer!
My choice of song as a classic wake up song Walking on Sunshine
My go to quote is also this one
“You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.” - A.A. Milne
I tag @Adrian to bring in the joy tomorrow! Have a great day!

joys.name: Adrian Burac

quote.message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote.name: Nelson Mandela

joys.message:
Good Morning ☀️
Thank you @Fenella Powell for the nomination!
My song choice for this morning is:
GAMPER & DADONI - Bittersweet Symphony (feat. Emily Roberts)
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - Nelson Mandela
I tag @Rachel Roberts! 😁
Wish you all happy coding and a great day ahead!

joys.name: Rikie Patrick

quote.message: There is still a lot to learn and there is always great stuff out there. Even mistakes can be wonderful
quote.name: Robin Williams

joys.message:
Thanks @Shirin for the nomination in the ✨ Daily Joy Challenge ✨
I thought I would revive a project for the Joy Challenge whilst doing the Makers Bootcamp last time. Please enjoy!.
My choice of song comes from a trio I have seen many times. Their sets always fill the room with such happiness and euphoria! Zoë Johnston features with stunning vocals on a song by Above and Beyond called “We’re All We Need”.
My inspirational quote comes from an incredible actor; the late, great and talented Robin Williams who dedicated his life to putting smile on other peoples face.
“There is still a lot to learn and there is always great stuff out there. Even mistakes can be wonderful”
 ― Robin Williams
@Pauline Lelièvre 🫵 You're up next!
Have an awesome day! 👋
